choices.D: From public FDNI server IP address with the fourth highest octet only
choices.B: From the configured override server IP address 10.0.1.50 only
choices.A: From the list of configured override servers or public FDN servers

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
As the server override mode is strict, there is no fallback. FMG will communicate only with server configure in override server list.

choices.D: It serves as an authentication token for subsequent API requests.
choices.C: It contains information about the HTTP request method used.
choices.A: It is used to identify the FortiManager metadata on the client.
choices.B: It includes a hash to check the integrity of the JSON response sent by FortiManager.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct, study guide page 34

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.
FMG 7.4 Administrator Study Guide

questions.question_text: When using the FortiManager JSON API, what is the purpose of the session ID received after successful authentication?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Correct Answer: A
FortiManager 7.4 Administrator Study Guide - Page No:210

A
An administrator must be part of an approval group, and have rights over the ADOM in which the session was created. Page 210 Study guide
A An administrator must be part of an approval group regardless of whcih admin profile an administrator account is part of

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.
having super_role is not sufficient to approve changes made by other administrator. The administrator should have been added to approval group.

questions.question_text:
An administrator, Trainer, who is assigned the Super_User profile, is trying to approve a workflow session that was submitted by another administrator, Student. However, Trainer is unable to approve the workflow session.
What can prevent an admin account that has Super_User rights over the device from approving a workflow session?

choices.A: Trainer is not a part of workflow approval group.
choices.C: Trainer must first create their own workflow session to approve student session.
choices.B: Trainer must close Student's workflow session before approving the request.
choices.D: Trainer does not have full rights over this ADOM.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
B,C study guide page 156

Selected Answer: BC
B,C
Study guide

Selected Answer: BC
B & C are correct

Selected Answer: BC
When running a script with the option Remote FortiGate Directly (through the CLI) it will be executed directly on the device.

A. Wrong. No option is provided to preview the configuration changes through FortiManager prior to executing it.
B. Correct
C. Correct
D. Wrong. Donâ€™t need to install the changes using the installation wizard

choices.C: FortiGate will auto-update the FortiManager device-level database.
choices.A: FortiManager provides a preview of CLI commands before executing this script on a managed FortiGate.
choices.B: FortiManager will create a new revision history.
choices.D: You must install these changes using the Install Wizard.

choices.C: It will create two firewall address objects on Local-FortiGate with 192.168.1.0/24 and 10.0.5.0/24 values.
choices.B: Local-FortiGate automatically chooses an IP/netmask based on its network interface settings.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct, because there is per-device mapping on the object for Local-Fortigate
